name: High income single filer
description: Single person earning €100,000 - high earner in second tax bracket

sources.description: Calculated using official 2024 Belastingdienst rates and tax credits with phaseout
sources.notes: First bracket: €27,919, Second bracket: €12,108, General credit: €0 (phased out), Labour credit: €3,931, Net ≈ €65,750
